channel.title: Need help with a drop bug
channel.description: so lets say im killing a rockcrab i would receive (bones, charms) and i pick up the bones and charms but it still says they are there and now there is (bones, bones, charms, charms) on the ground

item.title: Need help with a drop bug
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Yuck. 718’s need a lot of work done to them I would suggest going down a few revisions.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a drop bug

item.title: Need help with a drop bug
item.dc:creator: @purecoolbow purecoolbow
item.description:
@purecoolbow wrote:

no its not a error its just like a fake drop appears when you loot the items (makes it look like the items you just looted are still there but you cant pick them up) and 718

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a drop bug

item.title: Need help with a drop bug
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Are you saying you changed the drops, but the original items still drop with the new ones you added? Please state revision you are using and possibly a source so we know how to fix the issue. Assuming you are using a 639, you will need to find a duplicate of that npc or a “rare drop list” that is also coded into the npcdefeditor.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a drop bug
